review_blob: Bought a four pack from a supermarket in Belgium as something else to try.  With hindsight I wish I had bought all their remaining stock.  The flavour is of burnt toffee shot through with liquorish with a constant sweetish tang.  I also compared it with a Westvleteren 12 which my partner was drinking.  Were I trying these two in a blind tasting, I might just come down on the side of the Straffe Hendrik.
